outline.theme: Environmental and Economic Impact of Energy Projects

sections.title: A Costly Crossroads: Environmental and Economic Implications of Energy Projects
bulletPoints: Discover the staggering $35 billion cost of the Trans Mountain tar sands oil pipeline to taxpayers.
Hear Liz McDowell's poignant warning on the future of energy infrastructure.

sections.title: Trans Mountain Pipeline: An Examination
bulletPoints: Explore the environmental and economic controversies surrounding the Trans Mountain tar sands oil pipeline.
Understand the implications of its $35 billion price tag on taxpayers and its failure to reach full operational capacity.

sections.title: The Energy Landscape: Competitors and Alternatives
bulletPoints: Analyze how competitors and alternative energy projects are responding to the environmental and economic challenges highlighted by the Trans Mountain pipeline.
Discuss the shift towards sustainable and economically viable energy solutions in the wake of this controversy.

sections.title: Navigating the Future: Environmental Stewardship and Economic Viability
bulletPoints: Delve into the broader implications of the Trans Mountain project on policy, environmental stewardship, and the economic viability of future energy infrastructure.
Examine the role of public opinion, policy changes, and technological advancements in shaping the future of energy projects.

sections.title: Reflecting on the Crossroads
bulletPoints: Summarize key insights on the environmental and economic impact of the Trans Mountain pipeline and similar projects.
Reflect on the critical stance of environmental campaigners like Liz McDowell and the pivotal moment for sustainable energy decisions.
